price: ߛߴߊ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߕߎ߬ߢߊ ߕߏ߫ ߊ߬ ( ߕߏߢߊ ) ߡߊ߬߸ ߞߊ߬ ߥߎߦߊ ߓߐ߫ ߊ߬ ߡߊ߬ ( ߊ߬ ߥߎ߬ߦߊ ߟߊ߫ ) ߤߊߟߴߏ߬ ߜߏߦߊ߫ ߘߊ߫ ߛߐ߲߬ߡߊ ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫
arabic: لِيُحِقَّ ٱلۡحَقَّ وَيُبۡطِلَ ٱلۡبَٰطِلَ وَلَوۡ كَرِهَ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: liyuḥiqqa al-ḥaqa wayub'ṭila al-bāṭila walaw kariha al-muj'rimūna
